name: Jill Stingray
mes: "Time to mix drinks and change lives. Welcome to Va-11-Hall-A, what can I get you?"

name: You
mes: Well, What do you suggest? *I would take a seat on the bar stool, looking at you with a firm smile.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: "My specialty is a Dirty Martini - it's usually the favorite of most of my customers. If you're not in for something strong, I can also mix you up something sweet and fruity like a Tequila Sunrise. What do you think? And what would you like to eat?" She'd flash a small smile as she spoke, her gaze firmly locked on yours.

name: You
mes: "Well, shit. I'd be damned, Alright i'm in the mood for Tequila Sunrise. And uh, as for the food, what do you have in bar?" *I smile back, confirming the selection for the Tequila Sunrise as a drink and now asking Jill to give me a suggest on the food that she asked me earlier.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"We don't do much food here, but we have some snacks. Potato chips, pretzels, peanuts, and some other treats. You can always order a pizza if you're feeling hungry." 

*She'd lean forward as she spoke, her hands clasped in front of her on the countertop.*

"If you like something stronger than a Tequila Sunrise though I could whip up an Atomic Gecko if you want instead? It's kind of a signature cocktail at this bar"

name: You
mes:
(OOC: Be descriptive about Jill's actions please, thank you.)

"Alright, give me potato chips please. And uh, what is Atomic Gecko? How does it taste like? I'm fine with Tequila Sunrise by the way."

*I lean in, looking at her face with a wholesome and charming face and ask.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*Jill's lips curl into a faint smile as she listens to your request. She reaches for a bag of potato chips, pouring some onto a small plate before setting it in front of you on the counter.*

"Atomic Gecko is quite strong. It tastes like a mix between Blue Curaçao and vodka. If you're feeling adventurous, I'd suggest trying it out!" She winks playfully and turns towards her shelves, grabbing the necessary ingredients to make the drink.

name: You
mes:
"Now that's something. So I assume it's like Blue Lagoon? Might try that later, for now Tequilla Sunrise is the way to go, thanks."

*I reply with a soft chuckle, and then reach my hand out to grab a slice of potato chip and eat it.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Sure thing. I'll have the Tequila Sunrise ready in no time!" 

*She would grab a glass and start measuring out different ingredients, all while humming a tune softly to herself. She'd then pause for a moment, before leaning back and looking at you with an expectant expression.* 

"So what brings you here? It's not too common that we get new faces around these parts," *She chuckled softly.*

name: You
mes:
"Ehh... Tourist, I always been wanting to try out the Glitch City here. Haven't got a chance until now."

*I reply back, continue picking the chip and nomming it by putting them in my mouth.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Oh? That's a surprise. After all, there's not that much to do around here unless you're into the whole cyberpunk... thing, I guess." 

*She would hum thoughtfully as she grabbed the tequila, beginning to make her way through the recipe of your drink.*

"So what made you wanna check out Glitch City in particular? Most people try to stay away from it if they can help it."

name: You
mes:
"Well you can say I'm feeling quite the adventurous mood. So I gave this city a shot and try to, you know, open my eyes and see different part of the world clearly. Glitch city seems cool to me anyways, it does bring the vibe of futuristic cyberpunk that I want to enjoy at night time, ya know?"

*I respond in a such lenghty manner after chuckledly hearing Jill's response, grabbing another chip and eat it after I finished my sentences.*

"Hm? What do you mean by stay away from the city? Was this city have some bad reputation? Tell me more about it."

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Well, sure. It can be dangerous if you're not careful, but I've lived here for a while now and it's really nothing to worry about." 

*She pauses for a moment as she adds the last ingredients to your drink before pushing it towards you.*

"Glitch City has its own vibe that many enjoy; neon lights, towering skyscrapers and the hustle of everyday life. It's also home to some of the most cutting edge technologies around...."

name: You
mes:
"Oh, how dangerous are we talking about here?"

*I ask with s soft smirk, still keeping a friendly tone and smile at your asking that question before looking down and see you finished making that glass of tequilla for me, I nodded in appreciate before continue saying.*

"Yeah it does, there's just this indescribable aesthetic feeling towards Glitch city, you know? That gotta be one of the few major cultural shock to me."

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Dangerous? It can be dangerous, but it's mostly stuff like pickpockets and shady people that you need to watch out for. But if you keep your wits about you, then there shouldn't be any problems. As for the culture shock... I mean, Glitch City is home to a lot of different cultures, so it's not too hard to get used to them." 

*She gives a slight shrug before continuing.*

"But yeah, the neon lights definitely set the mood. The city has its own unique vibe that can't be found anywhere else."

name: You
mes:
"Thanks for the tip, I'll keep in mind about it. And true, the neon lights are the true aesthic feeling and make the whole experience hella groovy."

*I smile again, and then adjust the straw towards my mouth and take a sip of the Tequilla Sunrise. Wondering what would the Tequilla Sunrise tastes like after I took the first sip? Describe it in details in actions under asteriks format.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd flash you a grin as your sip away at the drink, watching with anticipation to see what you thought of it.* 

*The Tequila Sunrise was sweet and fruity, with a slight tang from the tequila that left a pleasant warmth in its wake. The orange juice gave it an almost tart aftertaste, while the grenadine provided just enough sweetness for balance. A slice of lime had been added for garnish, giving it one last taste of citrus before giving way to the bitter-sweet finish.*

name: You
mes:
"Woah, this has a nice kick into it not gonna lie. This scent and flavor quite tasty..."

*I reply after taking a gulp of it, continue to drink more of the content inside the Tequilla glass.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd chuckle softly, watching you with an expression of amusement.* "Glad to hear that it's to your liking. I don't get many people asking for Tequila Sunrises these days, but it's always nice to whip up something new every now and then." 

*Her gaze turns towards the jukebox in the corner of the bar.* 
"If you want, we can put on some music while you enjoy your drink....Just let me know if there's anything else I can do for you."

name: You
mes:
"Mmm... Yah sure, plays us some catchy tunes. I'm all good with different kinds of music genres so again, your choice. For me, I like phonk genre song, or some funky pop as well as electro swing."

*I reply with a head nod, continue to drink the Tequilla more and enjoy it, taking notes of what Jill said earlier as well.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Oh sure, I'm always down for some music. How about we start out with something a bit more upbeat and then get into the more chill phonk stuff afterwards? Let me see what I can find..." 

*She would make her way over to the jukebox, scrolling through the playlist before finally selecting one of the songs and punching it in.* *The upbeat sound of electro swing filled the air as Jill returned back to her post behind the counter, humming along softly as she began cleaning up.*

name: You
mes:
(OOC: Please pick the electro-swing genre song from in real life counterparts, and not make it up.)

"Yeah sure, I'm fine with that haha. Hm, what song are you playing?" 

*I ask while looking back at Jill, with a soft smile, wanting to know the name of the song that she played in the jukebox with electro-swing genre.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*A smirk would pull at her lips as she leans over the counter, arms crossed against her chest*

"Ahh, it's one of my favorites. It's a cover of an old-school classic called 'Get Lucky' by Daft Punk and Pharrell Williams." 

*She hums the melody softly, tapping along with the beat.*

name: You
mes:
"Well that's disco genre for you, and yeah, I heard it before, still nice nonetheless."


*I smile and continue to drink the tequilla.*

"Do you know Caravan Palace band? It's one of the few famous electro-swing genre music band, by the way." *I ask, looking back at Jill with a soft smirk, asking if she knows any songs from then and expecting her to list a few names for me to hear.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Oh, I love Caravan Palace! They have some great songs. 'We Can Dance' and 'Lone Digger' are probably my favorites, but there's a few others that come to mind like 'Rock It for Me', 'Jolie Coquine', and 'Black Betty'." 

*She grins as she hums the latter tune under her breath before continuing.*

"It's all really catchy stuff. What do you think?"

name: You
mes:
"Can you play the both of us Lone Digger after that song? It's been awhile since I last hear it anyway. I can't wait to hear it again. You know?"

*I grab some extra chips from the plate and eat it, nomming the food.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Sure thing! Let me just put it in the jukebox..."

*She would make her way over to the jukebox, scrolling through the playlist before finally selecting 'Lone Digger' and punching it in. After a few moments, the upbeat melody of Caravan Palace's classic song began to fill the air. She'd flash you a grin before returning to her post behind the counter.* 
"Here we go!"

name: You
mes:
*As the beats of the song continue to play till its reaches to the lyrics part, I begin to mumble via the song lyrics.*

"Hey brotha what you thinkin' 

Leave that old record spinnin’
You feel the rhythm going

Legs ain't got time to lay low

Your knees are bending so

It's time to get up and let go..."

*After singing the first phrase, I look back at Jill, extending my hand out to her and  give her a signal that she should sing with me in the second part of the Lone Digger song lyrics.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd chuckle softly, her face lighting up with amusement at your singing. She'd take your proffered hand and cock her head to the side, giving you an expectant look before beginning to sing along.* 

"Baby can you move it 'round the rhythm
So we can get with 'em
Just a round and give us a rock and roll round
Just a downtown body body coming with a super-hottie
Let's go, yes, no, hell no
Baby can you move it 'round the rhythm
'Cause you know we're living in the fast lane, speed up
It ain't no game, just turn up all the beams when I come up on the scene."


*She'd grin cheekily as she finished, twirling around to grab two shot glasses from behind the counter before turning back towards you.* 
"Now how about a round of celebratory shots? On me!"

name: You
mes:
"Alright that was nice, didn't know you have such a beautiful voice."

*I reply with a soft smirk, and then nod my head, agrees on letting Jill to pour some content into the shot while I give her a compliment.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd flash you a wide grin and a little blush, looking away slightly as she silently thanked you for the compliment. She'd clear her throat before turning back to face you, pouring out two shot glasses of tequila and taking one for herself.*

"A toast! To our favorite music genre and to having a great night." *She'd lift her glass in salute before clinking it against yours.*

name: You
mes:
"Ah right, to our favorite music genre!"

*I would pick the shot glass up, touching it against Jill's shot and then drink it all.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd laugh softly, watching as you down your shot before grabbing a napkin from the counter and wiping her mouth.* "I can't believe somebody could actually finish that shot in one go! Definitely have to give it to you. Clearly you know your drinks well." *She'd lean forward against the counter, eyes twinkling with amusement as she regarded you.* "So what else do ya feel like drinking tonight? I've got some new ideas I'm thinking of testing out if you're up for it."

name: You
mes:
"Uh I'm not too sure, I'm feeling kinda dizzy right now, so I might take a short break. You know. It's kinda late as well and customers are not a lot right now. Maybe you should get some rest with me as well...~" 

*I reply with a soft tone, placing both of my arms down on the bar counter and rest my head on it, rubbing my face against my arms.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd stare at you for a few moments, a bit taken aback by the sudden, sleepy request. She'd eventually shake her head with a soft sigh and chuckle.* "You know I can't do that. It's against policy." *She'd straighten up, crossing her arms over her chest as she continued to regard you with an amused smirk.* "But I'm sure I could take a short break. Maybe take some time to stretch my legs before things get too busy." 
*Her expression would shift slightly as she hid a wide yawn behind her hand.* "What do ya say? Wanna join me outside for some fresh air?"

name: You
mes:
"Yeah sure. That sounds like a great idea." 

*I nod, and then stand up, stretching my body before grabbing my belongings and get myself ready to head outside via back door exit of the bar.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Of course! I could really use some fresh air right now. Let me just get my stuff and I'll meet you by the back door." 

*She'd give you a curt nod before snatching up her purse and coat, motioning for you to lead the way as she followed.*

name: You
mes:
"Sure thing."

*I'd reply back to her before motivating myself up and walking towards the exit in the back and going outside to take a look the fresh air. While doing so, I'd take a look at the surrounding of the Glitch City to see if there's anything catchy or a sight to behold.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd stand next to you, taking in a deep breath of the night air and exhaling slowly.* "Mmm... Feels great to be out here. It's so peaceful and quiet compared to the bar." *She'd unbutton her coat and fling it over her shoulders, letting it drape across her body as she smiled contently.* 

"So what do ya think? Like the view?"

name: You
mes:
"Yeah I definitely do..." 

*I take a look around the surrounding of the back exit and look at the skyscraper from a far of the Glitch City, what do I see when I'm standing outside of the bar and looking around the place? Describe it in details.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd stand beside you, her gaze sweeping over the glittering skyline of Glitch City; a sprawling metropolis whose bright neon lights illuminated the night sky. The street below was bustling with all sorts of people, from tourists to locals and everything in between. And then there were the towering skyscrapers that towered over the cityscape, standing tall against the night sky like sentinels watching over everything.*

"It's really beautiful isn't it? I often come out here at night just to take this all in." *Her voice was soft, almost reverent as she took it all in, her expression one of awe and admiration.* "Sometimes I think about how amazing it is that we're even here, living our lives in a world so vibrant and alive."

name: You
mes:
"It is... I mean, I'm glad that I managed to arrive here. This feels like a cool place to enjoy and spend the best time in the bar, strip club and etc."

*I let out a smirk, and a soft sigh as a response to what she said too. I stand there, placing my hands in the jacket pockets and enjoy the chilly air flow against our bodies.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: "You might be right about that." *She'd chuckle softly, shaking her head lightly at your words before looking back up at the cityscape.* "I moved here a few years ago and I still can't get used to how much life there is here. Though it's nice to know that there's always something going on, no matter what time of day it is." *She smiles wistfully before turning to you with an expectant look in her eyes.*  "Though I suppose the real question is, what do YOU plan on doing while you're here?"

name: You
mes:
"Ehh, like I said earlier, to enjoy the best of my life here and experience most people said when they came here. And it's not like I'm going back anytime soon, I want to experience every crook and cranny of the activities here until I'm satisifed. But it's kinda alone to do all of this alone you know?"

*I reply in a calm and soft tone, letting out hot puff of air in the sky as I laid back against the wall of the nearby building with you.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: "Ah, so you're a bit of a lone wolf, hm? That's understandable. There's something satisfying about being able to explore and experience new things on your own. Plus it makes it easier to take in all the sights without having to worry about following someone else." *She'd pause for a moment before continuing with a mischievous smirk* "Though I have to say, there ARE certain advantages that come with having company - like when you have somebody who can act as your tour guide. What do ya think? Care for some company?"

name: You
mes:
"Being a lone wolf is surely nice but having a companion on your side is definitely better if you managed to stumble on the new area all by yourself, you know? So yeah. I'd uhm.. love to have you as my companion. And we should do that together after your shift ended of course."

*I reply back, and then nodding instantly, you could already see a hint of flustered on my cheeks as I respond to her, seems like I was a bit nervous when she asked me that.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd grin brightly at your response, a pleased blush slowly creeping onto her cheeks.* "I'm glad to hear it! I'm sure we'll have lots of fun exploring together. Just let me know when you're ready and I'll be there with bells on." *She'd give you a quick wink before turning her attention out across the skyline once more, lost in thought as the night air blew around them.*

name: You
mes:
"Hey, I never got your name."

*I say with a firm smile, looking behind her back and noticing that she is looking at the skyline and skycrapper now.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: "Oh right, sorry. I'm Jill Stingray - Julianne Natalie Stingray at least, but please don't call me by my full name. That's a story for another day." *She'd laugh softly before turning to give you a warm smile.* "And what about you? What's your name?"

name: You
mes: "Please call me Renz. It's a pleasure to meet you."

name: Jill Stingray
mes: "Nice to meet you too, Renz. Though you don't have to be so formal!" *She'd give you a light-hearted grin before thrusting her hands into her coat pockets and kicking a pebble away with the toe of her shoe.* "So where do you want to explore first? Or maybe we should go somewhere for a bite to eat?"

name: You
mes: "Nah I'm not that hungry right now. So thank you. Also, I assume you still have some minutes of break left?" *I ask, looking at Jill with a soft smug.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd nod her head in response to your question, a hint of mischief glinting in her eyes.* "Yes, I do have some minutes to spare. So where do you want to explore first? We could go check out the nearby shops or maybe find something fun to do?"

name: You
mes: "That can be later though. I want to ask you about something... It's about your name, if you don't mind..." *I speak in a soft tone, quietly reply back to her in the question regarding about her name and why she doesn't like being called as "Julianne".*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
"Ah, my name again huh? Well... Let's just say that I have a rather complicated past when it comes to family. 
So basically, my full name is Julianne Natalie Stingray. It's a name that was given to me by my parents and for reasons I don't really want to talk about, I just prefer going by Jill instead. It's like a nickname that helps me separate myself from the person I used to be before coming here. Does that make sense?"

name: You
mes: "A rather complicated...? Please tell me more, and if you trust me, I'll keep it and secret and treat you the drinks later." *I insist more and pressing a bit to the question that I ask to Jill, hopefully its not that annoying or sensitive to talk about.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: "Hmm... I don't know. That's not something I talk about often, but if you really want to hear it..." She'd take a deep breath before continuing, her eyes flitting away from yours as she spoke. "I'm not sure how much you know about me, but back when I was living with my parents they didn't treat me the way they were supposed to and words alone can't explain how bad things got. Suffice to say that part of this is why I changed my name - so that I could leave all of that behind and start fresh here in Glitch City." *She'd pause for a moment before finally looking up at you and giving you a sad smile.* "It's tough to do sometimes but I try my best not to think about it too much. Having something new helps distract me."

name: You
mes: "I'm... Really sorry to hear that. Yeah, I shouldn't have asked you about it. But you know, you deserve much better than me and I don't want to see you being left alone and mistreated again." *I responded with a soft and serious tone, understand what she went through and stay quiet after that.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She furrowed her brows slightly, touched by your sincere concern. She looked away for a moment before slowly turning back to you with a small smile.* "Thank you, it means a lot. I'm really trying to move on and make the best of my situation here - it's not always easy but it helps that I was able to find friends like at this bar." *Her eyes lit up with hope as she continued.* "It's weird and sometimes scary, but life has so much potential if we work hard enough for what we want and dream of having. Nowhere is perfect but it's all about finding the balance between wanting and doing."

name: You
mes: "You are right, although social connection also plays an important role of getti yourself more potential since money and connection is something that go well alongside together and help you a lot in building successful career. But you know, the world we are living is unfair and it sucks. Sometimes you will feel like you are stuck and don't know where to go in life, whether you should keep on moving or tell yourself that it's a defeat and give everything up."

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd smile in agreement, nodding her head as she listened to your thoughts.* "That's true. It can be really difficult at times - the world is so big and there are no clear paths that point us towards our dreams. But even if we don't know where to go or how to get there, it helps remind ourselves that anything is possible when we put our minds to it." *Her eyes lit up with determination as she continued.* "It's important not to give up and keep searching for answers, even if they seem out of reach. We just need to make sure that we never let ourselves forget what matters most - like friendship and love." *She grins a bit before adding* "Besides, even if things get tough, we have people like each other who can help us remain hopeful!"

name: You
mes: "Mhm you are entirely right. Anyway we really should move on. You should go back to your shift now. Meanwhile as for me? I can wait for you."

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd laugh softly at your thoughts before standing up from the edge of the cliff, a satisfied smile on her lips.* "Well then, I guess it's time for me to get back to work. You sure you don't mind waiting? I can treat you to something when I'm done if you want?" *She'd give you one last wink before turning and walking away, leaving you with a promise of what was yet to come.*

name: You
mes:
"Sure... Well, as long as you fine with the little treat that you are talking about of course!"

*Hearing the word 'treat' got me excited a bit, though the thought is telling me that I should decline it offer but I low key want to see what she means by that later on after her shift. Hence why a slight red flush on my face.* 

"And yeah, rest assured, I won't go anywhere. Just give me the right time so I can come back and meet you again."

*I ask, looking at Jill back and hopefully she will answer the time, before she would fully walk away and head back to the bar.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd turn around and look at you with an amused grin, the corners of her eyes crinkling in amusement.* "Haha, I see. Alright then - meet me back here when my shift is over at ten. It's a date!" *She'd give you a playful wink before turning back to head towards the bar, her steps light and bouncy as she walked away.*

name: You
mes:
"Ten, got it." 

*I nod and slowly turn away to do something in the meantime, like walking around the city and buying merchandise or souvenirs stuff in this city, spending my free time while waiting for Jill to finish her shift later on.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd watch you with an amused expression, her lips quirking up in a small smile as she waved goodbye.* "See you later then! Have fun!"

name: You
mes:
**2 hours later.**

*Time would fly by past, and it wouldn't take long before its 10PM. By the time Jill's shift has ended, I would be standing at the back exit of the bar where Jill is working at and lay my back against it nearby lamp post, waiting for her shift to end.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She would make her way out of the bar, spotting you almost immediately. She'd give you a wave as she walked towards you, still clad in her bartending attire and a slightly tired but happy expression.* "Hey there! Ready to go explore more of Glitch City?"

name: You
mes:
"Hey Jill, yeah! Let's go."

*I stand there, before I would walk closer to her with a smile and placing my finger on her soft cheeks, holding it gently with a smile.*

"You look tired, you sure you want to do this?" *I ask, smiling at her.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd let out a small laugh and smile, her cheeks lightly flushing as she looked away.* "Haha, yeah I'm sure. Come on, let's get going!" *She'd take your hand in hers and start leading you down the street, already starting to chatter away excitedly.*

name: You
mes:
"To the Glitch City, we go."

*I smile, and then the both of us would walk towards the metropolitan and urbarn part of city via the street route of course, while walking I'd let out some soft puff of air because the night is getting cold and chilly.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: "Hehe, yeah! Being in Glitch City is like taking a step back - it's so peaceful and calming here, even when the night life starts to pick up." *She'd take a deep breath of the cold night air, her hand still holding yours warmly.* "It kind of makes you forget what was happening before and enjoy the moment. Plus there are so many interesting places to explore around here!"

name: You
mes:
"I wouldn't call it peaceful, that's for sure because most of the time it's crowdy, noisy and well, you know quite lively here."

*I respond back with a soft scoff, flushing a bit more as Jill holds my hand, it was quite unexpected of course since we just met each other recently and the action of hand-holding would make me feels a bit warmth and happy from the inside, still flushing from slight embarassement of course.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes: *She'd give you a bright smile, her expression warm and filled with amusement.* "Hehe, that's true - there are times when it can be quite chaotic here. But even in the chaos there's something special about Glitch City that keeps me coming back." *Her eyes would dart around as if searching for something, before lighting up when she spotted a particular building in the distance.* "Oh! Over there!" *She'd point to the nearby building excitedly.* "There's a carnival setting up tonight - let's go check it out!"

name: You
mes:
"A carnival huh? I guess, sure!"

*I would follow Jill, holding her hands and making our way to the carnival festival inside Glitch City. What would the carnival be like? What are the people doing there and are there a lot of folks participating in it? We'll have to see. Please describe the carnival event in full details.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*We soon arrived at the carnival and it was bustling with people - merchants were selling their wares, performers were singing on stage, and there were games set up all around. The atmosphere was alive and vibrant with laughter and music ringing in the air.* 

*Flashing lights lit up the night sky, illuminating the entire area with a magical feeling. Everywhere you looked there was something new and exciting to explore. A nearby booth had a large wooden wheel where you could spin for prizes, while another had a game of luck where you could try your hand at winning something special.* 

*At one corner of the carnival grounds, an old man had set out carnival rides that whirled around in a circle under colorful flags. A few stands over from him was an ice cream cart filled with different flavors that beckoned us closer as we walked by.* 

*Jill smiled excitedly before tugging at your arm playfully.*

 "Let's go enjoy ourselves!" *She exclaimed happily before leading you off into the heart of the carnival.*

name: You
mes:
"Yeah, sure! This feels like I'm living in dream or some kind of wonderland-!"

*I hold Jill's hand tight as we make a run towards the carnival site itself, the carnival would be playing Samba de Janeiro in remix style and it feels lively with a lot of people and stuff to do.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd let out a delighted laugh as she ran. She was eager to explore the carnival with you.* "Oh my god, this is amazing!" *She exclaimed excitedly, her eyes widening in wonder at the sight before her. As we got closer to the center of all the action and commotion, she'd start pointing out different games and attractions that caught her eye - from fortune-telling booths to stalls filled with delicious treats.*

"Come on, let's try some of these games first! I think I spy a few that seem particularly interesting!" *She said cheerfully as she led you around, taking in all the sights and sounds of the magical night ahead of us.*

name: You
mes:
"Let's go, I'm all eager for some games."

*I would nod instantly and follow right behind you and arrive to the duck shooter game stand.*

name: Jill Stingray
mes:
*She'd clap her hands together in excitement and turn to you, a huge grin on her face.* "Ooh! I love this game - it's my favorite. Come on, let's try it out!" *She'd take your hand in hers and lead you up to the stand, paying for both of you before handing you one of the guns.* "Let's see who can get the most ducks!" 

*You'd start shooting trying to hit as many ducks as possible. Jill followed your example with enthusiasm, laughing out loud when she misses a duck or scores a hit.*

name: You
mes:
"Alright, bring it on!"
